ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/fhir+xml import * from dw::fhir::jsonToXml --- toFhirXml(payload)

ee:transform.doc:name: strip out ID and populate initial meta
remap mongo OID as resource ID

mongo:insert-document.doc:name: insert historical record

set-variable.value: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json fun fhirRefs(payload) = payload..reference reduce ((r, accum=[]) -> do { var parts = r splitBy '\/' var resource = parts[0] var key = parts[1] --- accum << { resource: resource, key: key } }) --- fhirRefs(payload)]
set-variable.doc:name: Set Variable
